articles.title: Scottish FA turn on their own women's team and say they are 'hugely disappointed' by the squad - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Scottish FA have hit back at its women's national team players after the entire squad publicly slammed their ticketing policy on social media on Tuesday evening.
articles.content:
